title: The Castaway cowboy
creator_credit: Vincent McEveety, Winston Hibler, Ron Miller and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Disney family film about a shipwrecked cowboy, Lincoln Costain (James Garner) on a Hawaiian island, and his adventures with widow Henrietta MacAvoy (Vera Miles) and land baron Bryson (Robert Culp). Henrietta has a struggling potato farm and through the aid of Lincoln, the farm is eventually turned into a successful cattle ranch. Bryson, who holds Henrietta’s mortgage, wants her land and is prepared to go to any length to get it. On confronting this predicament Lincoln has to decide whether to stay and fight for Henrietta or return to his home in Texas. Cast includes Eric Shea, Elizabeth Smith, Manu Tupou.
